name: The Mystery Of Roanoke
description:
Explore three of the theories people have about what happened to the lost colony of Roanoke! What is the meaning of the word Croatoan? Were the colonist wiped out by natives? Did other worldly being have something to do with it? Explore the different scenes that give a representation to these theories!

Interact with the Croatoan fence post, Alien monolith, alien ship door, and ship wheel to travel between sceens. E is the interact key.
